songs.title: What You Wanted
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'll find the places where you hide (oh, oh, oh)
I'll be the dawn on your worst night (oh, oh, oh)
The only thing left in your life (oh, oh, oh)
Yeah, I would kill for you, that's right  (oh, oh, oh)

[Chorus]
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted  (what you wanted)

[Verse 2]
I'll put your poison in my veins (oh, oh, oh)
They say the best love is insane, yeah (oh, oh, oh)
I'll light your fire 'til my last day  (oh, oh, oh)
I'll let your fields burn around me, around me

[Chorus]
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted (what you wanted)

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh

[Bridge]
Oh, I'll run out of this town
Oh, my love is true (oh)
Tell me (oh)
Something I wouldn't do

[Chorus]
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted
If that's what you wanted

[Outro]
Oh, if that's what you wanted
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
If that's what you wanted
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
If that's what you wanted
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
If that's what you wanted
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh)
